attributes.action: Ask the M.O.D. to alter their reckless driving by soldiers advertising campagn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The M.O.D. is to release a £ multi-million advertising campaign to educate soldiers on the dangers of reckless driving, following a number of fatal *car* accidents  involving soldiers. The advertising campaign features a soldier riding a *motorcycle* who loses control with fatal consecquences. Our belief is that this promotes a misleading image of motorcyclists, presenting them as reckless and dangerous drivers. We therefore ask the M.O.D to revise its campaign in the interest of fairness.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
